item.title: The Knights by Aristophanes
item.description: Play by Aristophanes It is in GB Volume 5. Newsletter post: www.readgreatbooks.info/p/great-books-ep-96-aristophanes-the People in the play: Demosthenes, Nicias, Sausage-Seller, Paphlagon, Demus, Chorus of Knights The Knights - Readwise Highlights Metadata Author: Aristophanes Full Title: The Knights Category: articles URL: readwise.io/reader/document_raw_content/263736038 Highlights ‘tis when men drink, they thrive, Grow wealthy, speed their business, win their suits, Make themselves happy, benefit their friends.

item.title: The Acharnians by Aristophanes
item.description: Play by Aristophanes It is in GB Volume 5. Newsletter post: www.readgreatbooks.info/p/great-books-ep-95-aristophanes-the People in the play: Dicaeopolis, Crier, Amphitheus, Ambassadors, Pseudo-Artabas, Theorus, Wife of Dicaeopolis, Daughter of Dicaeopolis, Cephisophon (servant of Euripides), Euripides, Lamachus, A Megarian, Two Young Girls (daughters of the Megarian), An Informer, A Boeotian, Nicarchus, Servant of Lamachus, A Farmer, A Groomsman, Messenger, Chorus of Acharnian Charcoal Burners The Acharnians - Readwise Highlights Metadata Author: Aristophanes Full Title: The Acharnians Category: articles URL: readwise.io/reader/document_raw_content/259210663 Highlights I pass the time complaining, yawning, stretching, I fidget, write, twitch hairs out, do my sums, Gaze fondly country-wards, longing for Peace, Loathing the town, sick for my village-home, (View Highlight) Am.
